mapper.insert: insert into exam (examCode, subjectCode, examName, studentCnt, startTime, endTime) values (#{examCode}, #{subjectCode}, #{examName}, #{studentCnt}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.update: update exam set examName=#{examName}, startTime=#{startTime}, endTime=#{endTime} where examCode=#{examCode}
mapper.select: select * from exam where subjectCode = #{subjectCode} order by startTime
select * from exam where examCode = #{examCode} and endTime > now() and now() > startTime
